description: Amendments to planning permission dated 05 October 2023 (RN: 23/04630/FULL) for variation of Conditions 1 and 3 of planning permission dated 15 May 2023 (RN: 23/01735/FULL) for alterations including partial infilling of rear courtyard on basement and ground floors, rear extensions on first to fifth floors and at sixth floor roof extension with plant enclosure, roof terrace and green roof above all to provide additional office accommodation (Class B1); new balconies/terraces at front fourth, fifth and seventh floor levels and rear first, sixth and seventh floor levels. Flexible use of part basement and part ground floor for either retail / office/ gym use (Class A1/ B1/ D2), provision of cycle parking and associated external alterations; namely, to install privacy screens on the first floor terrace, and to amend the wording of Condition 3 to enable the installation of the privacy screens; NAMELY, the provision of two condenser units and acoustic louvre at the sixth floor terrace.
